testcase.name: Amazon searchBox functionality check with valid product
testcase.system-out: Given I am on amazon homePage...............................................passed And I enter "Hand Sanitizer" in searchBox...................................passed When I click on search Button...............................................passed Then I should see "Hand Sanitizer" is properly appear.......................passed But I should not see "mobile" is appear.....................................passed And I verify "Amazon.com : Hand Sanitizer" in product title.................passed
